short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The scene is bathed in the soft glow of a full moon, casting a calming blue light across the forest.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
lowing butterflies or mystical creatures flutter through the air, enhancing the magical atmosphere. Jigglypuff, with its signature round, pink body and large, gleaming eyes, gazes joyfully at the sky. The combination of the serene forest and the cheerful presence of Jigglypuff creates a whimsical and peaceful vibe
